item.description: Creating virtual machines for testing If you don’t have a spare machine available for testing, you can create it locally, using VirtualBox and Vagrant. Make sure you have both tools installed by following respective guides: Installing VirtualBox Installing Vagrant Single node If you need just one machine, create file named Vagrantfile with the following content: Vagrant.configure("2") do |config| config.vm.box = "flatcar-stable" config.vm.box_url = "https://stable.release.flatcar-linux.net/amd64-usr/current/flatcar_production_vagrant.box" config.ssh.username = 'core' config.vm.provider :virtualbox do |v| v.
